title: Visible-light-activated antibacterial and antipollutant properties of biocompatible Cu-doped and Ag-decorated TiO<sub>2</sub> nanoparticles
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Panagiotis Tzevelekidis, Maria Theodosiou, Athina Papadopoulou, Elias Sakellis, Nikos Boukos, Alexandros K. Bikogiannakis, Georgios Kyriakou, Eleni K. Efthimiadou, Christiana A. Mitsopoulou
